res.msg:
The conditional check 'not lookup('file', '/etc/httpd/conf.d/ssl.conf') | bool' failed. The error was: An unhandled exception occurred while running the lookup plugin 'file'. Error was a <class 'ansible.errors.AnsibleError'>, original message: could not locate file in lookup: /etc/httpd/conf.d/ssl.conf. could not locate file in lookup: /etc/httpd/conf.d/ssl.conf

The error appears to be in '/tmp/tmp4w1j9ge_.yml': line 120, column 7, but may
be elsewhere in the file depending on the exact syntax problem.

The offending line appears to be:

    # Configuración SSL
